scripts.start:back: cd back && pnpm install && pnpm run build && pnpm run start
scripts.start:front: cd front && pnpm install && pnpm run build && pnpm run start
scripts.start: pnpm install && concurrently -k -n back,front -c green,blue "pnpm run start:back" "wait-on http://localhost:3001/graphql && pnpm run start:front"
